alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 9:28PM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, and Dubuque. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Burlington. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Water affects the Port of Burlington parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 15.4 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. The next statement will be issued this early this morning.
